caption.p: Study sites and location of traps in the Lower Rio Grande Valley (LRGV), South Texas and Reynosa (municipality), Tamaulipas. The 12 study locations in the LRGV are included as individual maps: PF/PE = Progreso Fresno/Progreso Encino; WCT = Weslaco, Christian Court; MM = Mercedes, Mesquite; DF = Donna, Figueroa; MLV = McAllen, La Vista; MCH = Mercedes, Chapa; MRR = Mercedes, Rio Rico; LF = La Feria; LP = La Pi√±ata; TB = Tierra Bella; IHE = Indian Hills East; IHW = Indian Hills West.
